resp = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "user.id": "kimchy"
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.count(
    index="my-index-000001",
    q="user:kimchy",
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.count(
    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "term": {
            "user.id": "kimchy"
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
